name: Breakout (itch) (JaykerX)
description:
Remake of a classic Atari game.

10 premade levels(1a-10a)
10 randomized levels(1b-10b)
10 slots for custom levels(1c-10c)

Use A/D or arrows to control the game.

Custom levels will be empty before you make them.

If you want to skip to randomized/custom levels hold B/C while pressing Start.
